content.body: in general, for anybody wanting to help out with the MDN JS docs, and looking for some low-hanging fruit, we have 4 issues labeled as needing 30 minutes or less to resolve https://github.com/mdn/content/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc+label%3A%22help+wanted%22+label%3AContent%3AJS+label%3A%22time%3A+-30mins%22+

…and overall we have just 34 issues for the JS docs that are labeled as “help wanted” https://github.com/mdn/content/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc+label%3A%22help+wanted%22+label%3AContent%3AJS (out of 620 open MDN issues overall)
